summary: San Francisco, officially the City and County of San Francisco, is a major city in California with about 809,000 people. It's known for being a hub for business, money, and culture. The city is small but very crowded, and it was heavily affected by the gold rush in 1849. San Francisco is home to many famous landmarks like the Golden Gate Bridge and Alcatraz. It's also known for its hills, different types of buildings, and fun neighborhoods. The city has many universities, museums, and sports teams. San Francisco International Airport connects the city to the world, and trains and buses help people get around.
title: San Francisco
